Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput

Interface SecureInputBuilder

public interface SecureInputBuilder
An interface that represents secure input.
Since:
4.4

  • Method Details

    • buildKeypad

      SecureInputUi buildKeypad(boolean isScrambled, boolean isDoubleInputField, boolean isDialog, SecureKeypadListener listener)
      Create a new secure keypad.

      Notice: This method should be called once all the necessary configurations have been done. Note that the default configuration will be applied for attributes that have not been set to custom values.

      Parameters:
      isScrambled - This value indicates whether the keypad would have scrambled key locations or not. The scrambling is completely random and different for each time the keypad is shown.
      isDoubleInputField - If this value is true then the secure keypad will show two input boxes. And if it is false it will show only one input box.
      isDialog - If this value is true then the secure keypad will be shown as a Dialog (Popup). And if it is false it will be shown as a View (FullScreen).
      listener - Interface to create the communication channel between library and the main application. This interface will be used when a user presses the keypad button. The secure pin will be provided as a callback value once the user input is finished.
      Returns:
      A SecureInputUi that contains the secure keypad DialogFragment and method selectInputField.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when the listener is null
      IllegalArgumentException - when:
      • Swap control buttons and shift support both are set
      • Shift is enabled but number of row is less than 2
      Since:
      6.0
      See Also:
      • swapOkAndDeleteButton()
      • setShiftKeys(List, List)

    • buildKeypadClearText

      SecureInputUi buildKeypadClearText(boolean isScrambled, boolean isDoubleInputField, boolean isDialog, SecureKeypadListenerClearText listener)
      Create a new secure keypad.

      Notice: This method should be called once all the necessary configurations have been done. Note that the default configuration will be applied for attributes that have not been set to custom values. Notice: This method should be called after invoking RootDetector.getRootStatus() to make sure the device is not rooted.

      Parameters:
      isScrambled - This value indicates whether the keypad would have scrambled key locations or not. The scrambling is completely random and different for each time the keypad is shown.
      isDoubleInputField - If this value is true then the secure keypad will show two input boxes. And if it is false it will show only one input box.
      isDialog - If this value is true then secure keypad will be shown as a Dialog (Popup). And if it is false it will be shown as a View (FullScreen).
      listener - Interface to create the communication channel between library and the main application. This interface will be used when a user presses the keypad button. Character list will be provided as a callback value once the user input is finished.
      Returns:
      A SecureInputUi that contains the secure keypad DialogFragment and method selectInputField.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when the listener is null
      IllegalArgumentException - when:
      • Swap control buttons and shift support both are set
      • Shift is enabled but number of row is less than 2
      Since:
      6.0
      See Also:
      • swapOkAndDeleteButton()
      • setShiftKeys(List, List)

    • buildKeypadEncrypted

      SecureInputUi buildKeypadEncrypted(boolean isScrambled, boolean isDoubleInputField, boolean isDialog, EncryptionConfiguration encryptionConfig, SecureKeypadListenerEncrypted listener)
      Create a new encrypted secure keypad.

      Notice: This method should be called once all the necessary configurations have been done. Note that the default configuration will be applied for attributes that have not been set to custom values. Notice: This method should be called after invoking RootDetector.getRootStatus() to make sure the device is not rooted.

      Parameters:
      isScrambled - This value indicates whether the keypad would have scrambled key locations or not. The scrambling is completely random and different for each time the keypad is shown.
      isDoubleInputField - If this value is true then the secure keypad will show two input boxes. And if it is false it will show only one input box.
      isDialog - If this value is true then the secure keypad will be shown as a Dialog (Popup). And if it is false it will be shown as a View (FullScreen).
      encryptionConfig - The configuration for encryption.
      listener - Interface to create the communication channel between library and the main application. This interface will be used when a user presses the keypad button. The secure pin will be provided as a callback value once the user input is finished.
      Returns:
      A SecureInputUi that contains the secure keypad DialogFragment and method selectInputField.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when the listener is null
      IllegalArgumentException - when:
      • Swap control buttons and shift support both are set
      • Shift is enabled but number of row is less than 2
      Since:
      6.2
      See Also:
      • swapOkAndDeleteButton()
      • setShiftKeys(List, List)

    • setKeys

      void setKeys(List<Character> keys, List<String> subScripts)
      Set the character choices for the constitution of the Keypad. This is a character set indicating the possible characters that can be displayed.
      Parameters:
      keys - The keys to be set, cannot be null or empty. Don't allow duplicate characters. Default value is 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0. The list's length must be less than 36
      subScripts - (Optional) The subscription of the keys; each item's length must be less than 4
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If:
      • Key list is null/empty
      • Invalid length of keys or subscription
      • The keypad does not contain enough space to display all the keys (characters) and buttons, refer setKeypadMatrix(int, int)
      Since:
      6.0
      See Also:
      • SecureInputDefaultSettings.DEFAULT_KEYS
      • SecureInputDefaultSettings.MAXIMUM_KEYS_LENGTH
      • SecureInputDefaultSettings.MAXIMUM_SUBSCRIPT_LENGTH

    • wipe

      void wipe()
      Wipe away all the sensitive data of the Secure Input Builder. Including clearing the character array and erasing key press record.

      Notice: The wipe will only reset the character array and scramble option. other non-sensitive configuration such as color setting and text-label setting won't be reset in this function.

      Once wipe being called, the secure keypad is required to be dismissed / closed and re-built before next time usage.

      Since:
      4.4

    • setScreenBackgroundColor

      void setScreenBackgroundColor(int color)
      Set the screen background color of the keypad.
      Parameters:
      color - Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.SCREEN_BACKGROUND_COLOR.
      Since:
      4.4

      image - the screen background image.
      mode - configure how the image should be displayed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the image is null.
      Since:
      6.0

    • setLogoBarBackgroundColor

      void setLogoBarBackgroundColor(int color)

      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeyFont

      void setKeyFont(android.graphics.Typeface font)
      Set the custom font for buttons including key and the subscript of key.

      </>Note: This function only applies to keys and the subscripts of keys. The control buttons, i.e. OK button and delete button, are not affected by calling this method. Call the methods setOkButtonFont(Typeface) and setDeleteButtonFont(Typeface) to configure the OK button and delete button font respectively.

      Parameters:
      font - the typeface of the button text.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the font is null.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeyFontSize

      void setKeyFontSize(int size)
      Set the key font size.
      Parameters:
      size - the font size of keys. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_FONT_SIZE
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the font size is NOT in the range of 1 to 100.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeyColor

      void setKeyColor(SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState state, int color)
      Set the text color of the keys for normal and selected state. Note that OK and delete buttons are not included. Call the methods setOkButtonTextColor(UiControlState, int)} and setDeleteButtonTextColor(UiControlState, int)} to configure the OK button and delete button text color respectively.
      Parameters:
      state - The button state, there is no SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.DISABLED for the keys to be displayed on the button.
      color - the color to be set. Default value
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.NORMAL is SecureInputDefaultSettings.KEY_COLOR_NORMAL
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.SELECTED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.KEY_COLOR_SELECTED
      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeypadWidth

      void setKeypadWidth(float width)
      Set keypad width.

      Notice: This method must be called if developers want to call setLogoImage(Bitmap) or setLogoImage(int). Otherwise, this method is not compulsory.

      Parameters:
      width - the keypad width, should be a value >= 0.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the width is less than 0.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeypadHeight

      void setKeypadHeight(float height)
      Set keypad height.

      Notice: This method must be called if developers wish to call setLogoImage(Bitmap) or setLogoImage(int). Otherwise, this method is not compulsory.

      Parameters:
      height - the keypad width, should be a value >= 0.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the height is less than 0.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeypadHeightRatio

      void setKeypadHeightRatio(float heightRatio)
      Set the height ratio of the keypad against the entire secure keypad (keypad + top screen).

      Notice: This attribute only takes effect when secure keypad top screen is enabled.

      Parameters:
      heightRatio - the height ratio of the keypad, should be in the range of 0.25 to 0.5. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.KEYPAD_HEIGHT_RATIO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the height ratio value is NOT in the range of 0.25 to 0.5
      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeypadMatrix

      void setKeypadMatrix(int rows, int columns)
      Set the matrix (number of rows and columns) of keypad.
      Parameters:
      rows - Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.NO_OF_ROWS.
      columns - Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.NO_OF_COLUMNS.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the number of rows is NOT in the range of 1 to 8, or number of columns is not in the range of 2 to 8.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setKeypadFrameColor

      void setKeypadFrameColor(int color)
      Set the frame color of the keypad.
      Parameters:
      color - the color, default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BORDER_COLOR
      Since:
      4.6

    • setKeypadGridGradientColors

      void setKeypadGridGradientColors(int gridGradientStartColor, int gridGradientEndColor)
      Set the grid gradient start and end color for keypad grids.
      Parameters:
      gridGradientStartColor - the start color of grid gradient, default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BORDER_COLOR
      gridGradientEndColor - the end color of grid gradient, default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BORDER_COLOR
      Since:
      4.6

    • setDialogHeightToScreenRatio

      void setDialogHeightToScreenRatio(float ratio)
      Set the height to screen ratio of keypad in dialog mode. This method is only applicable if keypad is shown as Dialog (i.e. isDialog is true when you build the secure keypad using buildKeypad(boolean, boolean, boolean, SecureKeypadListener)).
      Parameters:
      ratio - ratio of the keypad height to full screen. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.DIALOG_HEIGHT_TO_SCREEN_RATIO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when ratio is less or equal to zero.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setDialogWidthToScreenRatio

      void setDialogWidthToScreenRatio(float ratio)
      Set the width to screen ratio of keypad in dialog mode. This method is only applicable if keypad is shown as Dialog (i.e. isDialog is true when you build the key pad using buildKeypad(boolean, boolean, boolean, SecureKeypadListener)).
      Parameters:
      ratio - ratio of the keypad width to full screen. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.DIALOG_WIDTH_TO_SCREEN_RATIO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when ratio is less or equal to zero.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setRippleEffectParameters

      void setRippleEffectParameters(int color, long durationMs)
      API to set the ripple effect parameters like duration and color.
      Parameters:
      color - The color for ripple effect parameter.
      durationMs - The duration for ripple effect parameter, unit is in millisecond. Requires setButtonTouchVisualEffect(com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput.SecureInputBuilder.ButtonTouchVisual) be called first, set the visual effect be ripple.
      Since:
      5.0

    • showTopScreen

      void showTopScreen(boolean show)
      Set whether to display the top screen of secure keypad.
      Parameters:
      show - true to show the top screen and false to hide the top screen. Default is true.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setSubscriptFontSize

      void setSubscriptFontSize(int size)
      Set the font size of subscripts.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of subscripts to be configured.Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.SUBSCRIPT_FONT_SIZE
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the font size is NOT in the range of 1 to 100, or the font size is bigger than key font size.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setSubscriptColor

      void setSubscriptColor(SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState state, int color)
      Set the color of subscripts for normal and selected state.
      Parameters:
      state - The button state, there is no SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.DISABLED for the subscript to be displayed on the button.
      color - The color of subscripts to be configured. Default value
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.NORMAL is SecureInputDefaultSettings.KEY_COLOR_NORMAL
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.SELECTED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.KEY_COLOR_SELECTED
      Since:
      4.4

    • setDistanceBetweenKeyAndSubscript

      void setDistanceBetweenKeyAndSubscript(int distance)
      Set the distance between key and subscripts.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance, should be in the range from 0 to 4. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.DISTANCE_BETWEEN_KEY_AND_SUBSCRIPT
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the distance is less than 0 or greater than 4.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setButtonBackgroundImage

      void setButtonBackgroundImage(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
      Set background image for all the buttons.
      Parameters:
      image - the button background image.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the image is null.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setButtonBackgroundImage

      void setButtonBackgroundImage(@DrawableRes int resourceId)
      Set Button background image resource id for all the buttons.
      Parameters:
      resourceId - the resource id of the button background to be set.
      Since:
      4.8

    • setButtonBackgroundImageOpacity

      void setButtonBackgroundImageOpacity(SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState state, float opacity)
      Set the background image opacity for normal and disabled state for all the buttons.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to be configured for. Not applicable for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.SELECTED
      opacity - the opacity, should be a value between 0 and 1.0. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.DEFAULT_OPACITY
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the opacity is NOT in the range of 0 to 1.0
      Since:
      4.4

    • setButtonBackgroundColor

      void setButtonBackgroundColor(SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState state, int color)
      Set the background color for all the buttons.
      Parameters:
      state - the button state.
      color - the color of the state. Default value
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.NORMAL is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_NORMAL,
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.SELECTED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_SELECTED
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.DISABLED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_DISABLED
      Since:
      4.4

    • setFirstLabel

      void setFirstLabel(String label)
      Set the text of the first label.
      Parameters:
      label - The text for the first label. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.FIRST_LABEL.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the label is null.
      Since:
      4.4

      IllegalArgumentException - when the label is null.

      void setLabelFontSize(int size)
      Set the label font size.
      Parameters:
      size - the label font size. Default: SecureInputDefaultSettings.LABEL_FONT_SIZE
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the font size is NOT in the range of 1 to 100

      4.4

    • setLabelAlignment

      void setLabelAlignment(SecureInputBuilder.LabelAlignment alignment)
      Set the label text position.
      Parameters:

      Since:
      4.4

    • setButtonHighlightColorOpacity

      void setButtonHighlightColorOpacity(float opacity)
      Set the highlight color opacity of all the buttons.
      Parameters:
      opacity - the opacity, should be a value between 0 and 1.0. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.DEFAULT_OPACITY
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the opacity is NOT in the range of 0 to 1.0
      Since:
      4.4

    • setButtonBorderWidth

      void setButtonBorderWidth(int width)
      Set the button border width for all the buttons (must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 8)
      Parameters:
      width - button border width. Default : SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BORDER_WIDTH.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the width is NOT in the range of 1 to 8.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setButtonPressVisibility

      void setButtonPressVisibility(boolean isVisible)
      Set whether the buttons should be highlighted when pressed. For security reason, it's disabled by default. User won't be able to see the state change when the button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      isVisible - Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_PRESS_VISIBILITY.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setButtonGradientColor

      void setButtonGradientColor(SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState state, int buttonGradientColorStart, int buttonGradientColorEnd)
      Set the start and end color of the button gradient for the corresponding control state.
      Parameters:
      state - the control state.
      buttonGradientColorStart - the color to be set. Default values
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.NORMAL is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_NORMAL,
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.SELECTED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_SELECTED,
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.DISABLED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_DISABLED,
      buttonGradientColorEnd - the color to be set. Default values
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.NORMAL is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_NORMAL,
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.SELECTED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_SELECTED,
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlState.DISABLED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.BUTTON_BACKGROUND_COLOR_DISABLED,
      Since:
      4.8

    • setButtonTouchVisualEffect

      void setButtonTouchVisualEffect(SecureInputBuilder.ButtonTouchVisual buttonTouchVisual)
      Set the visual effect for keypad button touch like highlight or ripple.
      Parameters:
      buttonTouchVisual - The visual effect for keypad button touch. Requires setButtonPressVisibility(boolean) be called first, set button press to be visible.
      Since:
      5.0

      Parameters:

      4.6

    • setOkButtonBehavior

      void setOkButtonBehavior(SecureInputBuilder.OkButtonBehavior okButtonBehavior)
      Set the OK button behavior.
      Parameters:
      okButtonBehavior - the behavior to be set. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.DEFAULT_OK_BUTTON_BEHAVIOR
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when okButtonBehavior is set to SecureInputBuilder.OkButtonBehavior.NONE or SecureInputBuilder.OkButtonBehavior.CUSTOM and the maximum input length does not equal to the minimum input length set by setMaximumAndMinimumInputLength(int, int)
      Since:
      4.4

    • setIsOkButtonDisabled

      void setIsOkButtonDisabled(boolean disabled)
      Set the OK button disabled state when the OK button behavior is configured as SecureInputBuilder.OkButtonBehavior.CUSTOM or SecureInputBuilder.OkButtonBehavior.ALWAYS_ENABLED.
      Parameters:

      Since:
      5.0

    • swapOkAndDeleteButton

      void swapOkAndDeleteButton()
      Set whether to swap the position of OK button and Delete button. By default, OK button is on the left and the delete button is on the right.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setMaximumAndMinimumInputLength

      void setMaximumAndMinimumInputLength(int maximumLength, int minimumLength)
      Set the maximum and minimum input length for the input field. SecureInputBuilder.OkButtonBehavior.NONE and SecureInputBuilder.OkButtonBehavior.CUSTOM require minimum and maximum input length to be the same.
      Parameters:
      maximumLength - Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.MAXIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH.
      minimumLength - Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.MINIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the minimum length is NOT in the range of 0 to 16, or maximum length is NOT in the range of 1 to 16, or minimum length is bigger than maximum length.
      Since:
      4.4

    • setInputFieldFontSize

      void setInputFieldFontSize(int size)
      Set the font size of the input field.
      Parameters:
      size - the font size of input field to be set. Default value is SecureInputDefaultSettings.INPUT_FIELD_FONT_SIZE
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the font size is NOT in the range of 1 to 100
      Since:
      4.4

    • setInputFieldBorderColor

      void setInputFieldBorderColor(SecureInputBuilder.UiControlFocusState focusState, int color)
      Set the color of the input field border for for corresponding focus states.
      Parameters:
      focusState - The state to be set.
      color - the color of the focus state. Default value
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlFocusState.FOCUSED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.INPUT_FIELD_COLOR_FOCUS,
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlFocusState.UNFOCUSED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.INPUT_FIELD_COLOR_UNFOCUS
      Since:
      4.4

    • setInputFieldBackgroundColor

      Set the background color of the input field for for corresponding focus states.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of input field.
      color - the color of the focus state. Default value
      • for SecureInputBuilder.UiControlFocusState.FOCUSED is SecureInputDefaultSettings.INPUT_FIELD_BACKGROUND_COLOR_FOCUS,

    • setIsShiftButtonVisible

      void setIsShiftButtonVisible(boolean visible)
      Set the visibility state of the SHIFT button. By default it is not enabled.
      Parameters:
      visible - The visibility state
      Since:
      6.0

    • setShiftKeys

      void setShiftKeys(List<Character> keys, List<String> subScripts)
      Set the character list to be displayed on the keypad in case SHIFT button is activated. This API must be called after setting the main character list with setKeys(List, List).
      Parameters:
      keys - The keys to be set, cannot be null or empty. Don't allow duplicate characters.
      subScripts - (Optional) The subscription of the keys.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If setKeys(List, List) has not been called yet.
      IllegalArgumentException - If:
      • Key list is null/empty
      • Invalid length of keys or subscription
      • Swap control buttons is enabled, refer swapOkAndDeleteButton()
      • The keypad does not contain enough space to display all the keys (characters) and buttons, refer setKeypadMatrix(int, int)
      Since:
      6.0
      See Also:
      • SecureInputDefaultSettings.MAXIMUM_KEYS_LENGTH
      • SecureInputDefaultSettings.MAXIMUM_SUBSCRIPT_LENGTH

    • setShiftButtonText

      void setShiftButtonText(String text)
      Set the text label for the SHIFT button.
      Parameters:
      text - The button label. Length must be less than 14.
      Since:
      6.0

    • setAccessibilityEnabled

      void setAccessibilityEnabled(boolean isEnabled)
      API to enable the accessibility
      Parameters:
      isEnabled - when the accessibility is set then the keypad view will be ready for accessibility features which is enabled from system settings. The default value for the API is NO
      Since:
      6.7.0
